component.name: Inochi Session
component.summary: Tool for using Inochi2D puppets for streaming.

description.p: Inochi2D is a framework for realtime 2D puppet animation which can be used for VTubing, game development and digital animation.
Inochi Session is a tool that lets you use your Inochi2D models for live streaming.
This build of the project doesn't include the original branding assets and it's not supported by the original project authors. If you have any issue, contact the package maintainer.
